name: Amazon AppConfig
short: A service that enables AWS users to create, manage, and quickly deploy application configurations.
description: AWS AppConfig is a service that enables application owners to manage, deploy, and monitor application configurations without downtime. This service facilitates the implementation of configuration changes in a controlled manner, with the ability to validate changes before deployment. It also supports rollback if issues arise. Integrated with AWS Systems Manager, it allows developers to create a configuration data central repository. AWS AppConfig is instrumental in promoting operational stability while enhancing the speed and agility of application updates.
